Create a new conversation from selected template
View/Remove previously selected sentences for this turn

There are two templates to choose from that act as a framework for the chat. Each one is made up of pre-defined turns and the child's selections at various points determines the course of the conversation. 
When you edit or create a chat you will be shown each element in either green or red boxes. The colours flag whether an element has at least one sentence assigned to it or not (green for former, red for latter). 
 Click on the element to enter the configuration screen. 
 Select each element in turn from the drop down and add one or more sentences/phrases for it. 
For Child turns they will be able to choose from a list of these and for the Agent turns one will be chosen at random. 
All sentences are added to the sentence bank (making them available to choose for similar turns in future conversations that you create) as well as the chat if they don't already exist. You can remove from the sentence bank or just the chat using the - buttons.
